title: WHIRLING F2 / DREAM 2 HANGED MAN
description:
1. You have a conversation with the hanged man dressed in your disco outfit.
2. You find out that you have failed Elysium.
THE CORRECT VERSION

dialogueTree.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Do you remember the scent of your c..."
dialogueTree.text: Do you remember the scent of your childhood?

links.title: You: "What *is* this?"
links.text: What *is* this?

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "What it says on the can, Harry. Ans..."
links.text: What it says on the can, Harry. Answer the question.

links.title: You: "I remember nothing."
links.text: I remember nothing.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Do you remember your wife's hand on..."
links.text: Do you remember your wife's hand on your face?

links.title: You: "TELL ME WHAT THIS IS!!! I'm not ans..."
links.text: TELL ME WHAT THIS IS!!! I'm not answering before you tell me who you are.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "You know who I am. I am the bad day..."
links.text: You know who I am. I am the bad day. The one where you ask her, and then later in the streets, wandering... It's the worst day of all time, Harry dear, and it's coming. She will hear about it on the phone.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Reality will turn into a grotesque..."
links.text: Reality will turn into a grotesque nightmare. This'll be the last thing you did to her. Tell me -- do you remember the love of your life?

links.title: You: "You said... who?"
links.text: You said... who?

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Do you remember the warmth of her t..."
links.text: Do you remember the warmth of her thighs, between her legs and in her mouth?

links.title: You: "I left."
links.text: I left.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Oh no, funky-baby, you *stayed*. It..."
links.text: Oh no, funky-baby, you *stayed*. It was the rest of it that left. While you just stood there. With one hand on the bottle and the other on your dick -- watching it go.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Tell me, where are your friends? Hu..."
links.text: Tell me, where are your friends? Human beings have friends, Harry-boy. Where the hell are yours?

links.title: You: "I can get it all back."
links.text: I can get it all back.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "No. It's gone. Three times gone and..."
links.text: No. It's gone. Three times gone and never coming back. You failed. You failed me.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "You failed Elysium."
links.text: You failed Elysium.

links.title: You: "What is Elysium?"
links.text: What is Elysium?

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "Everything. The pale and the isolas..."
links.text: Everything. The pale and the isolas -- on the surface -- the outer magnetosphere... Burning, furious truth, eight thousand years of written history.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "You really dropped the ball, Harry...."
links.text: You really dropped the ball, Harry. Four point six billion people -- and you failed every single one of them. You really *fucked up*.

links.title: You: "I've seen you before..."
links.text: I've seen you before...

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "No, Harry. You were just talking to..."
links.text: No, Harry. You were just talking to yourself. That's all you ever do. Even in your dreams. And the act is wearing thin, the spots of the disco ball fade around you...

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "You'll be back in those cold snake..."
links.text: You'll be back in those cold snake skins in no time, sweating up the bed...

links.title: Limbic System: "Stinky boy."
links.text: Stinky boy.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "No, you haven't. You're just sleep-..."
links.text: No, you haven't. You're just sleep-talking. And the act is wearing thin too, the spots on the disco ball fade around you...

links.title: You: "I can come back from this."
links.text: I can come back from this.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "You're not coming back from shit! T..."
links.text: You're not coming back from shit! Thrashing around in that *high-conductivity state* of yours, bumping into things and acting like a *clown*. Who are you kidding?

links.title: You: "I'm trying to solve... trying to so..."
links.text: I'm trying to solve... trying to solve this case.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "You're trying to what? I can't hear..."
links.text: You're trying to what? I can't hear you, this is just a word-dream now. Jumbled up garbage. The pictures are gone, the bed rises to meet you. A thin sleep-like state. More glass than velvet, *grinding* in your head.

links.title: Limbic System: "So-something is *wrong*. Sleep shou..."
links.text: So-something is *wrong*. Sleep shouldn't be this bad. This dry. This un-nourishing. There's something wrong with your thoughts. Some kind of... new type of hangover...

links.title: You: "God... there's *another* type?"
links.text: God... there's *another* type?

links.title: Limbic System: "Oh yes, party boy. And it's *worse*..."
links.text: Oh yes, party boy. And it's *worse* than the one before! Just think of the shit you saw! Here it comes too, so soon already! A silent alarm goes off in your head, like clockwork, barely let you sleep at all... Time to get those clothes on, Harry!

links.title: Limbic System: "Time to go to work in the shit fact..."
links.text: Time to go to work in the shit factory!

links.title: Limbic System: "..."
You: "What? No!"
links.text: What? No!

links.title: You: "My mind is tired and broken."
links.text: My mind is tired and broken.

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Your mind is what now? I can't hear..."
links.text: Your mind is what now? I can't hear you, the rest is just a word-dream. Jumbled up garbage. The pictures are gone, the bed rises to meet you. A thin, sleep-like state. More glass than velvet, *grinding* in your head.

links.title: You: "Help me..."
links.text: Help me...

links.title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Help you, why? I can't hear you, th..."
links.text: Help you, why? I can't hear you, the rest is just a word-dream. Jumbled up garbage. The pictures are gone, the bed rises to meet you. A thin, sleep-like state. More glass than velvet, *grinding* in your head.

links.title: You: "I don't want to come back."
links.text: I don't want to come back.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "They were only cramping your *desce..."
links.text: They were only cramping your *descent into the abyss*. Now they're gone. Three times gone and never coming back -- all of it. You failed. You failed me.

links.title: You: "I was left."
links.text: I was left.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "That's right, funky-baby, and you j..."
links.text: That's right, funky-baby, and you just stood there. One hand on the bottle and the other on your dick -- watching her go. Let it all be dragged away from you.

links.title: You: "I was born in a hospital where peop..."
links.text: I was born in a hospital where people usually go to die.

links.title: Bloated Corpse of a Drunk: "You're not kidding anyone, Harry. Y..."
links.text: You're not kidding anyone, Harry. You don't remember shit. Tell me...
